description:

Some really great cock sucking, and geeeeeezzz..Ransom can really suck dick! I think I found another local dude to help with the Serviced videos!
And of course another great timed cum shot and Teo even volunteered for a facial!
Ransom is awesome, and can't wait to work some more with him!
title: Ransom & Teo - Serviced
